title: Info-Board插件如何使用papi变量？
author: Craftwolves
txt_content: 如题，Info-Board插件如何使用papi变量QAQ？

replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content:
那个是自带的变量，照着帖子写就行
或者用miaoboard
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D

replies.author: 基努
replies.txt_content:
你的插件帖子能不能发过来我看看
要支持papi首先得插件支持然后你加变量进去才有用

replies.author: pp1416516975
replies.txt_content:
http://mineplugin.org/PlaceholderAPI
PaPi变量大全，并且有教你怎么导入
